text:
C151 at semniyak is just a walk away from Seminyak square, lots of bars,shopping, convenience stores etc, and just a stone throw away from KudeTa and the beach. This is one of the best located villa property in seminyak.

Service is par excellence, check in took just 2 mins. meanwhile the luggage was shifted to our  2-bedroom + entertainment room (converted to kids room) villa, we were explained to operate the gadgets which were in huge supply and in every nook n corner of the villa;
like : Jacuzzi & steam room with TV Screens, motorized curtains, living room with expansive music system, entertainment room with electronic massage beds and the list goes on..
The breakfast is served right in your villa at your convenience. Room service menu is not too great but has something from every cuisine to offer.

We went during the Nyepi which is balinese new year and had to stay in the villa all day long with no outdoor activities. This could have been a disaster in any other hotel or resort but in C151 we enjoyed the villa's pool (which is quite big) with pool music system & kitchen to cook some INDIAN food. Not to forget the in-Villa couple massage just $ 60 for 90 min,, steal !

This place is a bit pricey compared to NUSA DUA luxury properties, but a different taste from regular luxury hotel rooms !

text: My partner, brother and sister-in-law have just returned from 8 days in Bali, 5 of which we spent at C151 Smart Villas. Having been to Bali 5 times previously, and being a huge fan of Seminyak, I found C151 to be perfectly located. Within walking distance of the beach, bars and restaurants, and yet far enough away for a little quite time in your villa. We stayed in a 3 bedroom villa, which we found to be very spacious, clean and tidy. The service was fantastic... nothing was a bother and all requests were actioned immediately. The staff were very friendly and happy to be of assistance. Their english was not the best but hey that's Bali, and if you are patient, speak clearly and simply communication is not a problem. The breakfast was ok, though as its not cooked on site and delivered to the villas, it's wasn't as fresh as an onsite breakfast. That said though we had no problems with requesting more juice, butter or brown bread instead of white etc. The staff were very accommodating. The high-tech gadgets i.e. remote control blinds, stereo and automatic toilet flash etc. gave the villas a point of difference and were quite fun. I'm sure there are better villas in Seminyak for the price however I doubt you'd find a better location and overall service and space provided at C151. I would definitely stay there again and recommend to others!!!
title: "Great location and great service"

text:
Spent 16 nights in 2 Bedroom Smart Villa. In fact all villas are identical. They open up 1, 2 or 3 bedrooms. This means that all the common areas are always available : Rather big swimming pool, terrace, living room, dining room and kitchen. The most "high tech" thing we found was the automated toilet. You get used to it after a while. The rest is equipped with remote controls :light, curtains, airco, tv etc. Nice are the loudspeakers throughout the villa (inside and outside) that can play the same music (MP3, Radio, CD). 
A major checkup of our villa would get rid of a number of small problems. But when a problem was mentioned, immediate  corrective action was taken. 
Staff are helpful, friendly and polite, although their English knowledge is sometimes limited. Hey, this is Bali...
The breakfast (included in the price) is always the same; Not bad, but not a highlight.You can allways get extra food or drinks in the nearby supermarkets, like we did. It is prepared in the central kitchen and then served in the villa.
To go to beach (in front of Kudeta), you just call for a buggy, who brings you there in 2 minutes. Nice and easy.
The C151 villa's are located in the heart of Seminyak, so no problem to WALK to many restaurants. 
We would definitely recommend it to friends who are looking for a space to relax.
title: Great Location, quiet and a lot of space.

text:
Just got back from a 6 night family vacation in Bali june 18th to 24th. it was the perfect getaway. We stayed in the 3 bedroom villa. The location is excellent ... just a 2 minute walk to the beach (Ku de ta) as well as local shops and and eating places. 

The villa was well maintained and and clean. The pool was also clean. We had a couple of  minor issues with the music system and the water level of the pool which were very promptly attended to by the maintenance staff - ( bravo to them). 

breakfast was good and ample - (part of the deal) and always delivered and set up at our dining table  precisely at the time requested. 

The staff was polite, always smiling and very non-intrusive which we loved.

As far as negatives - would have preferred an in-house tourism desk. The prices for tours quoted to us at the hotel were exorbitant compared to the brochures picked up at the airport. we ended up hiring a private taxi for the 6 of us which worked out just great and managed to get a much much better deal for the places we wanted to visit.

A Word of Warning - not related to the Hotel - there is a money changer in a lane just ahead of mini mart on the right. His board will display the best exchange rates for Dollars and Euros - He will count out all the money in 50,000 notes and ask you to count it as well - Then place it in different piles on the counter he then asks for small change for the remainder amount  and at the last moment when your attention is diverted to giving back small change he will very cleverly remove one of the piles - I got taken once and went back with my wife and son and asked them to keep staring at the piles of money --- once he knew that the game was up ... he refused to change the currency at that rate and asked for a 10% commission and cleverly got out of changing the currency  

Apart from this one incident our holiday was superb. !!! Congratulations to the management and staff of C151 - well done guys - We would gladly return and stay with you.
title: Fabulous Family vacation

text: The four of us (my friend and our daughters) have experienced a dream vacation for this past week.  The facility, staff, and ambiance have exceeded our expectations. While we have been to Bali many times prior to this trip, we have never enjoyed the degree of excellence of hospitality of  C151. This has "raised the bar" and changed our plans for trips in times to come. Villas are definitely the way to go and C151 offers the utmost in comfort.

text:
These villa's really are the epitome of Balinese luxury. 3 floors, two private pools, views of the ocean. They are HUGE, indulgent and lavish. Personally it was just a bit much for me, but my tastes are more simple. 
If you are after extravagance this is the place for you. They look just like the professional photo's - only you are there so it's even better. They wont disappoint you if you like what you see on the website. 
The top floor pool is a really lovely touch - it's only a foot or so deep so it's nice and warm and you can just lounge around privately, looking at the ocean and just soaking up the good life! 
The spa bath plus pools plus ocean views makes for a water immersed relaxing stay. There are playlists ready to pump through the surround sound, plenty of places to lie about, views from everywhere and more and more parts to discover as your stay goes on. 
Definitely recommended for those with bounteous tastes (and budgets..)
title: luxury

text:
Our second and last stay here. The location is great, but the villas are tired & run down & management are hopeless.  We booked a 2brm + media room.  However when we arrived at our villa they had locked the media room and wanted to charge us an extra $100 a night to access it! We had to produce our booking confirmation to get them to unlock the room. We had also organised a late check out to 8pm prior to our arrival for an additional cost of $280.  I had to pull out the original email agreement to avoid being pushed out at 6pm. They also tried to charge us the $280 twice.

In our villa the sound system didn't work, the aircon in the main living room didn't work, there was an infestation of ants and there was construction work banging and clanging all day from next door.  I put some laundry in which came back with rust stains all over it. They agreed to not charge us for it, but then it showed up on our bill anyway, along with 2 beers at AUS $11 each that were never even in our fridge to begin with. 

There are better options in Seminyak.
title: Tired & run down.

Warmest greeting from  all team of C151 Smart Villas.

We would like to thank you for choosing C151 Smart Villas as place to spend your holiday in Bali and we do really appreciate your constructive comments on Trip Advisor.

We are aware of your discomfort related  to room blocking , laundry , late checkout charge and project,  please accept our most sincere apologize for all that kind service.

Although your second experience did not completely satisfy your expectations. We hope that your experience in our property does not deter you from any further visit to this villas.

Should you or  any relative be traveling to C151 Smart Villas Bali in the future , I would kindly request you to contact me to assist in your accommodation details . It is our commitment that your experience would be greatly improved and I may ensure we exceed your expectations .

I would also like to repeat my most sincere apologize should you have perceived at any time during your last stay a lack of due attention or interest . This was never the intention of C151 Smart Villas Management and Staff.

Sincerely,

Gede Suarsa
General Manager 
gede@c151.net
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Just got back after an Epic Weekend in Bali. Stayed at C151 for 3 nights in a 3 bedroom villa. the Villas are hi tech and new.. located right next to Seminyak Junction and walkable to KuDeTa. I would have expected a higher rating for C151 in tripAdvisor. Anyways.. I would recommend it to people who want to be located near walking distance to the Seminyak strip.
title: Good Villas at a great location

text: We purchased  accommodation vouches for this property on eBay, when we arrived they said that it was not from them but they can offer us a special room rate of $550US per night. A quick search on Agoda had rooms for $399US.  I could not afford that so we left for alternative accommodation. I was thinking about what happened after and when we first arrived I called the villas from the airport and stated we had arrived and requested transport, she asked what the name in the voucher was and I told her my wife's names only and the booking reference no, what was odd was she then said my name which is on the voucher we have. They knew about the booking and are part if the advertising campaign to get people to there accommodation offering cheap rates then act like they know nothing about it. The receptionist has slipped up by saying my name. My bank is investigating the transaction and I have eBay and PayPal involved too.
title: False advertising FRAUD

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Robert K,

Warmest greetings from C151 Smart Villas Seminyak…

First of all, I would like to thank you for writing the review on Trip Advisor. 

I really understand how disappointed of you regarding the case of your booking for C151 Smart Villas Seminyak via third party company on eBay website.

Please be noted that the promotion or the auction that you found on eBay website was not our promotion but it was been done by the third party company that never having the agreement with our property C151 Smart Villas Seminyak, however all details and information available are beyond of our responsibility. We have contacted the company regarding this issue since it is happening not the first time and indeed it’s really harmed our establishment, but we never got the answer or never receive the response back from the company.

By understanding this s, we kindly to suggest you by contacting the company that you have booked and was issuing the booking voucher for C151 Smart Villas Seminyak.

We are pleased to advise you with the following points regarding to your booking:

- First, C151 Smart Villas does not have direct partnership with the third party company that doing the auction on eBay website.

- The third party company that you found on eBay website has never forwarded the confirmation of your booking to C151 Smart Villas.

C151 Smart Villas has never received payment confirmation from the third party company.

- Our rate that has been advertised by the third party company is not correct.

Mr. Robert, again I am very sorry about this happened to you and I do hope it would be more understanding on your side.

Should you or any relative be traveling to C151 Smart Villas in the future, I would kindly request you to contact me to assist in your accommodation and I may ensure to exceed your expectations.  

Further information or require any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contacts us at www.c151.net, reservations@c151.net  

Sincerely,

Gede Suarsa
General Manager

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Stayed here on a family holiday with my partner, her two 9 year old boys, my 17 year old daughter and her friend. Kids all loved the gadgets and the private pool.  Close to Seminyak area and the beach (enter through Ku De Ta). Staff were all very helpful and, despite being a bit expensive for Bali, we were were very happy overall.
title: High Tech

text:
We stayed in a 2 bed villa for 5 nights over Christmas. This obviously peak season cost $700/ night (4 people) incl breakfast. Which is on the expensive side in Bali for a family but we decided to treat ourselves for Christmas & stay somewhere nice.
2 couples staying in off peak probably around $250 per couple which is not too bad.
The villas have good sized separate rooms with their own ensuites & spa baths in each. Which is gr8 for couples staying together. A toilet in the main kitchen/ lounge would have been handy.
You have a private pool area with your own lovely sized pool which is clean & well maintained. Outdoor speakers to listen to music out by the pool & speakers underwater too which my son thought was cool. I hate fighting to swim in a big hotel pool in peak season with thousands of kids so this was very pleasurable.
Bit slippery round the pool & walking into the wooden floored villas.
The location is great. Right near Ku de ta restaurant which is a really funky place, great food & a nice place to spend an evening watching the sun set over dinner.
Also not far from Potato Head, W, & Sarong all really lovely restaurants &  as the Balinese say they are the 'be cool' places to go.
Also a short walk to the beach (the staff will take you in a buggy if you like) a bit dirty like most Bali beaches I prefer to swim in the villa pool personally. The Oberoi St shopping strip is in the other direction & next door to the local flea market. Good exchange rate non commission money changer on the nearby St. ATMs in walking distance at Seminyak square or local minimart. 
Try to book your own driver for day trips to Safari park etc direct as its expensive through the hotel. ($40 for the whole day is a good price- it was nearly $70 thru hotel)
The hotel organised driver & golf for hubby in Nusa Dua it was very expensive & a long day! But closer & less costly is the golf course in Sanur apparently.
For those winging about missing out on a 10% discount on a massage at the villa (which must have been what about $15-20?) A great massage place opened called Bee 7 right next door. Go see Astri she is lovely & has worked in 5 star hotels around the world -she has magic hands. A 1 & 1/2 hour hot stone massage was $12 !! (costs $100 at home) Therefore not unreasonable to pay her a bit more  :) very relaxing & highly recommend it.
The welcome drinks & cold towels were lovely upon arrival at the villa. The staff were attentive & very friendly. The same butler for the stay would have made it much more personalised though.
The room service food was quite reasonable in price & quality. The beverages in the mini bar like water & soft drink were not expensive & saved a trip to the mini mart. Even better if restocked during the stay but sadly it wasn't which meant a trip to the mini mart which wasnt far away.
The fridge has cold water dispenser & ice machine connected to bottled water which is safe to drink & very handy
Dont use the villa laundry service it worked out to over $30 for a small family load of washing, we jumped in a taxi (with a meter)  & went to the nearest laundry, total cost $7 same day service incl taxi which was well worth it!
A few of the gadgets didn't work from time to time but the staff were always on hand & ensured it was always fixed promptly & just minor things anyway like low batteries in aircon remote/ telephone, & sensor for glass door.
Breakfast was nice a bit more variety like pancakes, proper muffins, pastries other cereals & also fruit like bananas, mango & strawberries would have been good.
Massive road works on way in to Kuta at the moment which means for even more time spent in traffic :( So allow extra time to get to the airport 
I prefer fixed price shopping but don't mind bartering. But tourists who haggle prices over a few dollars drive me mad. the people have so very little seriously, make their day & give them some extra :))
We really enjoyed our stay & glad that we splashed out & treated ourselves to this lovely holiday. 
It was our kids first trip & they loved it. Can't wait to save & plan our next visit.
Thanks to the lovely staff for making our stay so special over the Christmas period. The lovely Santa stockings with goodies were a lovely touch!
title: Lovely private villa in great location

text:
We stayed at C151 Seminyak 3 bedrooms villa for 2 nights in September 2012. We traveled as a group of 5. When it said 3 bedrooms villa, it's actually 2 bedrooms with proper beds and one massage room - where it has an electric operated massage bed covered with bed sheet.

Upon arrival, we were greeted and a butler showed us around the villa and welcome drinks were nice. There were also complimentary 'fruit' basket which contained 3 green apples. We were unsure as there were 5 of us and only 3 apples. So we thought they forgot to put the fruit basket in the villa for us to share. When I questioned about this, they said yes,  the 3 apples are the complimentary fruit basket. The occupancy of 3 bedrooms villa is normally 6 people, 2 per bedrooms, and I was puzzled by the fact that we were supposed to share the apples among us. With a villa charging USD$600/night, I supposed asking for an apple/person is reasonable?!

We also booked for in-house massage and at the time I booked the accommodation i was given a 10% discount on Spa treatment. This service was paid upon check out and I didn't check the receipt as I thought they would've taken this 10% discount into account (my bad). So, when I realized they overcharged my credit card, I emailed them straightaway. Their only method of refunding is through bank account. I do not have an Indonesian bank account and getting them to refund back to my credit card took several emails chasing up and one month later they agreed to refund it back to my credit card.

When you check out, please allow more time as they need to arrange a butler to the villa to check for the drink consumption which took longer than we expected.

Overall the experience wasn't great, it was an average villa, the condition wasn't great anymore, it's a modern villa but you can feel it's not well taken care of.
title: Average Villas

text:
Just got back from 5 days staying at this beautiful villa. What can I say it was amazing, spacious rooms, great service & great location (great toilet seat!!!!). We will be coming back here  for sure.
This Villa is a must to stay in you won't be disappointed in your stay. 100% recommendation to stay at C151 Villa's Seminyak. Assunta & Maria
title: Beautiful Villas

text:
I stayed in a 3 bedrooms villa on a new year holiday.

The villa itself is large, nicely decorated and very hightech.
The swimming pool is enjoyable.
It is right next to Kudeta and a throw away from Seminyak beach, although in my opinion Seminyak beach is not very enjoyable especially for swimming.

The setback: the breakfast are tired, it takes a while to call for a room service or housekeeping, it is very high tech so sometimes it is difficult to operate things.

Notes: The aircon in the bedrooms are blowing right at us, and somehow we couldnt adjust the right temperature and the speed of fan with the remote, its a bit frustrating.
title: Nice but with flaws

text: Just got back from staying at the C151 villas in villa 14, These villas were lovely after reading some reviews before leaving saying that the gagets didnt work well we had no problems with anything including the fancy toilet which was a novelty,we had our own huge pool which was excellent had a couple of massages out by it, the services was good, rooms really clean extra towels on demand,golf buggy would pick you up outside your villa and take you to reception area, plenty of restaurants around the area right next to the KuDeTa which was lovely food was excellent and just up the road a bit you could get high tea that was something different in bali overall would go back and stay there again loved it thanks c151 for a excellent stay.
title: Lovely Villas

text: Luxurious, great service, gorgeous pool and attentive service. Handy location. Definitely an enjoyable stay and would recommend it to others. Rooms spacious actually HUGE.  We also got food from sate Bali and enjoyed it and so close to other gourmet options. Hope we can come again
title: Such a lovely places to come back to

text:
Amazing villa.
Great location. 
5 min walk to Seminyak beach.
Some things might not work time to time but staff here are attentive and always helpful.
Kharisma was my butler. 
Look for him when you go here.
title: EXCELLENT!

text: Very nice & luxurious villas, all the great amenities you would expect & then some. Staff friendly & helpful, great place to relax on vacation. Would come again, especially if the AirAsia deal still exists next time!
title: 2 Weeks in Bali @ C151

text:
Booked it for the features these villas have to offer after checking out tripadvisor reviews. Check-in was smooth and we were soon taken to our 1 bedroom villa. This place is just out of the world. The private pool was right at the entrance and the layout of the villa is awesome. The living room, was quite spacious and comfortable. 

The best part is the technology that they have. Music wherever you go in the villa. There are so many televisions in the villa that we did not even get to switch some of them on even once! There were 5 i think! Electronically controlled curtains, lights, fans, they had it all. The toilet was quite high tech too ;) We even had shower options in the shower room! 

Breakfast was good and timely delivered and laid out in the dining area. Staff was prompt with all requests.

The villa ensures a lot of outdoor privacy. We spent a lot of time at the pool and there was comfortable furniture outside. 

The location was fantastic and all the good restaurants are within walking distance.

The only drawback was the jacuzzi that never worked. There was some black stuff coming out of the vents which the staff tried to repair but could not succeed. 

But that could not change our mind and this place is the best stay we've ever had! The stay could not have been better.
title: Dream honeymoon :)

text: Excellent place. Service was prompt and polite. The place was superb. As the website suggest, deep in technology, down to the WC. Location wise, C151 is very close to the beach (5 min walking) as well as being close to the shopping and dinning of Seminyak. Highly recommended.
title: Dream Holiday

text: The villa provides great privacy! We had 3 young kids and they all enjoyed the villa facilities like the pool, the massage bed in the AV room and the jacuzzi tub.  Location is convenient to go to the beach, restaurants and shops.  Highly recommended for family stay!!
title: Enjoyable family stay!!

text:
I was unsure looking at the critics on various e-sites. Are we happy we took a chance!
It was great. The front desk was helpful in organizing a driver-guide we used for 3 days and giving us the local pointers for restaurants and nearby attractions.
Peace and quiet in luxurious surroundings and a short walk away from the best restaurants and boutiques on the island.
What more do you want and at a reasonable price in comparison.
title: Happy we did not follow the e-critics

text:
C151 Villas are very high standard, luxury accommodation in central Seminyak.

The Villas are very spacious, with large living areas leading onto a wrap around pool. Bedrooms and bathrooms also offer plenty of space. 

The fitout is to a high standard, with bathrooms and the kitchenette well appointed.

The Villa offers an onsite villa BBQ service at a reasonable price (US 55 per head). The food was very good and there was certainly a lot of it.

Service is friendly and efficient. The staff go out of their way to be helpful.

The location is good, with entrances next to the Oberoi Hotel and just down from Seminyak Square. Bali's upmarket venues are nearby (Ku De Ta and Potato Head), and there are plenty of lesser dining options within walking (or a short taxi ride) distance.

I could not fault the quality of the accommodation or service. However, the only point that stops me giving C151 full marks is the price, and hence value. At nearly SGD 3,000 for 4 nights, the price is pretty steep and I think that, for that price, you would want something absolutely stunning. C151 is very, very good but only average for value.
title: First Class Villa Stay in Quality Location

text:
We've just returned from Bali.  We spent 3 nights at the W Resort in a 2 bed villa and decided to leave early as we weren't too impressed with the service or the villa itself, especially at the extortionate prices we were paying!!  We moved to the C151 villas and were over the moon.

We got a 3 bed villa which was spacious, had a huge lounge/dining/kitchen area, a massive pool which was super clean and 3 super clean, big bedrooms.

It was all very high tech with electronic lighting and curtains.  A double massage bed. Jacuzzis in 2 bedrooms, a steam room in another, even the toilets had TVs and electronic 'butt' washers and dryers.

Breakfast was delivered to our villa every morning having chosen what we wanted the evening before.  It was beautifully set up on our dining table.  

Nothing was too much trouble and within 2/3 minutes of calling for anything, it arrived at our electronic, CCTV'd door!!

The location is perfect, as you're placed in central Seminyak where all the rstaurants and shops are.  It's 2 minutes to the beach and the C151 Villa buggies will take you there.  The famous Ku De Ta restaurant is also a short buggy ride away.

Our only gripe was that we wished we had taken brand new, crisp, unmarked Dollar notes as they do not accept anything less for payment!!!

A great place for a family holiday.
title: 5 star accomodation at 3 star prices!

text: C151 looks better than most places - it originally was to be about a $600 per night location - yet you might get a booking for $300 today.  Why - many problems with maintenance of villas - staff was great but hardly what is expected of a $300 night location.  I really would like to know repeat business - other than villa owners...
title: Watch out for issues in ownership

text:
They say C151 is a smart villa, it is anything but a smart villa as nothing works and is poorly maintained. My wife daughter an I stayed in the so called Presidential suite in January, it is supposed to be the hotel owners private villa. We had to move as all the gadgets failed miserably. The next villa wasn't much better. 
It wasn't all bad because our rates were fantastic around $300 per night, they must be desperate because to be honest when we were looking it seemed like they would give us whatever rate we were prepared to pay.
Our recommendation would be to avoid C151 unless you like the frustration of having high tech stuff that doesn't work.
title: What a huge disappointment

text: We stayed 6 nights at the C151 Villas, the villas are pretty high-tech, but most of the time, we didn't end up using the gadgets in this villas as we were spending most of the time either in the pool or at the beach.  The pool was big and super clean, the bathrooms were huge and the whirlpool bath was an added bonus. Service at this establishment was good, we had a sick child and the staff were able to arrange a team of doctors to come to our villa to check on him.  Our garden lights were not working though as it would switch on and off (even if the hotel engineer came to look at it three times) so we ended up sitting outside in the dark in the evenings with only the lights from the villa.  Room service and breakfast is not fantastic and I was surprised to find a lack of Indonesian or Balinese dishes to choose from.  However, the location of this hotel is perfect as it is close to all the shopping, excellent restaurants, supermarkets and beach.  Ku de ta is literally right next door!  I was very happy with my stay at C151 villas.
title: Great villas

text:
C151 Smart Villas in Seminyak provides guests with a glimpse of luxury. From the moment you walk through the doors and behold the splendour of the villa to the time you take your first dip in pool, this accommodation makes you feel like you have stepped onto a movie set.  We stayed in a 3 bedroom villa each with its own bathroom and toilet, 2 of the bedrooms having spa baths, the other having a steam room.  There are Tv's in practically every room, including bathrooms and toilets, I think we counted 7 televisions!! There are dvd players in all bedrooms and lounge rooms.  The villa itself is spacious and light and all rooms open up to the outside area which hosts a magnificent pool.The air conditioning in all rooms provides some respite from the humidity should you need to drag yourself away from the pool area!!!!! This accommodation whilst not cheap, definitely provides the traveller with the opportunity to have complete peace and quiet away from the routine of a working life.  Whilst we didnt make full use of the butler service, preferring to eat out, it is available 24/7 should you need it.  The villas are ideally located within a 2 minute walk of the beach, though to be honest, having a private pool to laze about in doesnt encourage you to make that walk to the beach!!!! There is a full cleaning service of the rooms daily and more so if you require extra towels during the day.  The staff are always on hand to tend to every request.  C151 is located next to Ku De Ta and The Oberoi and is within walking distance of some fantastic restaurants, bars and shopping. 
All in all C151 Seminyak provides guests with a perfect break from the outside world to recharge the batteries.  Each Villa is so completely private and self contained that if you chose, you would not need to leave the villa and could immerse yourself in total peace and quiet!!!!
title: PEACE, QUIET,LUXURY!!!!

text:
Got here a bit accidentally since we were firstly booked in another villa, but the travel agent made a booking mistake so they offered us to stay here with a bit of a discount (around USD 600 per night for a three bedroom villa). 

All I can say is, we were glad the agent got our bookings wrong because this place is uber cool!

Great service, nice rooms, huge pool and oh-so-nice ambience. We usually spent a lot of time outside the hotel/villa when in Bali, but here, we became too lazy to go outside because it was very comfortable just to stay in and, well, just get lazy :)

We have booked the same villa for our next Bali trip this April. Can't wait! :):):)
title: Great Villa!

text:
we were actually surprised that these kind of luxury high tech villas exist in Bali. Everything is so well organized and the price 1000 usd for a huge 3 bedroom villa during the peak season i guess not bad at all. Stuff is very pleasant and professionally trained, paid their best attention ever. we had one of the best times ever. they took care of everything...you can even find condoms in a fridge, huge massage bed which is so comfortable, music system with lots of different variety of cds, steam rooms, jacuzzi and electronic toilet bowl which has open and close buttons, dryer, front and back cleaning...that's all is just simply amazing!
its a bit far from the beach but we didn't even need it as the pool was so big and clean. 
the bad thing is that these villas are so good that you don't even feel like leaving it.
we are definitely coming back!
title: The best villa i've ever been to...

photos.caption: amazing view from the living room
TV in front of the toilet bowl

text: Very satisfied with the villa, each room at the villa very clean and comfort specially the bed and the huge toilet spa! Everything is Perfect cant wait to go back to stay at c151 again
title: Great place to stay

text:
This is an independent collection of luxurious, high tech villas located in the heart of Seminyak.  There is very little in the way of common areas / amenities that you would find in a hotel or resort development, but each villa is very generously sized and self contained.  What you lose in terms of resort pool / restaurant / spa ambiance you gain in terms of privacy and space.  And while the villas have no beach frontage, they are right next door to the Oberoi, Ku De Ta and Seminyak Square.

The villas are in good repair, but are showing a bit of wear and tear.  We stayed in a 3 bedroom villa and each room had its own high capacity air conditioning, private bath suite, 2 with whirlpool baths and all 3 with automated Japanese Toto toilet units and tvs in the bathrooms. The central living area can be fully opened to the elements (glass concertina doors all around) and is surrounded by an excellent pool.  The living room has an attached entertainment area (big flat screen tv, dvd player, surround sound) with the ability to pipe music from an ipod or iphone to any/all rooms in the villa as well as the pool area.  No DJ required!

Breakfast is provided each day via a roving butler on a golf buggy and while the range and variety is good, it would be a stretch to say that the quality is on par with the larger hotel chains. A small quibble really given the price.

Overall, we think that C151 offers excellent value for spacious, high tech modern accomodation that is extremely well located for the delights of Seminyak.  While the on-site catering does not match the quality of the villas themselves, this is a very small negative (think of it as a free option, which it is given the price) as all the restaurants and bars of Seminyak are on your doorstep and this being Bali - they will deliver too!

If you are an independent holiday maker who does not need (or want to pay for) the infrastructure and amenities or a major resort / hotel, you should consider C151 in the Seminyak area.
title: Private high-tech villas in the heart of Seminywak

text: Extremely spacious villas... huge living area.  Lovely pool - big and good depth. Very high tech - although some of the tech doesnt quite work.  If you book through one of the discounted sites then it is a very good deal - full price would not be worth it.  A little faded.... Variable quality room service, variable staff.  Front desk really good but butler did not even bother to show us how the room worked properly leaving us to phone every time we needed something.  If I could put good rather than very good I would - it is more than average.
title: Excellent location

text:
The C151 Villas are truly divine and very luxurious for the price.  There is a very understated small non air-conditioned lobby, so the arrival experience whilst welcoming, wasn't spectacular.  However once you get to your villa you will be amazed at the level of luxury.   This place is very high tech and once you get the hang of all the remote controls to open the curtains, another for the TV and another for the stereo system (the music is even piped under water in the swimming pool) you will love what the place offers in technology.   By goodness, even the toilet seat lifts up as you approach and flushes automatically when you finish!  I enjoyed buying dvds across the road for $1 and then watching them on one of the many tvs (there was even a tv over the bathtub)

These villas are possibly in the best location in Seminyak.  Slightly away from the madness, right next door to one of Bali's most popular bar and restaurants, Ku De Ta, yet a short walk into the action of bars, restaurants and shopping and a one minute walk to the beach!  The location is one of the key factors in staying at C151.  Taxis are everywhere (use only Bluebird taxis with a metre and they are super cheap)

The swimming pool at your villa is enormous by private villa proportions.  Two gorgeous double bed size sun lounges with a market umbrella sit at one end of the pool and its hard to tear yourself away from this environment to even bother leaving the villa.

I loved the decor - very stylish and contemporary, although a little more colour around the place might have been an improvement.  The beds were amazing and so very comfortable and the bedrooms are of course all individually controlled with their own air conditioner.  Outside the villas and within the resort complex you would never know you were in a 5 star luxury resort as they have done very little to the public areas to enhance the look but step inside the automatic villa doors accessed by your keycard and WOW - the villas are amazing.

The staff at the villas are amazing.  Lead by Gede, the General Manager who was most accommodating with any request, the staff are on hand to clean, provide daily linen change, service the pool etc etc.  They are very sweet and courteous and discreet and no request went unattended to.

If you are looking for a three bedroom villa to accommodate up to 6 people, then look no further.  You'll be hard pressed to find something this amazing for the same price.  Very modern, very chic, very comfortable.
title: location, location, location

text:
We have just returned from C151 Smart Villas, this was our first stay here and upon arrival to the villa we were worried as the main entrance and driveway doesn’t look the best. Our check-in went smoothly and we were taken to our room with no problems and didn’t have to wait however be prepared for a training course from the Butler in regards to how to use everything, all the high tech stuff ended up really getting on our nerves as we are on holiday and just want things to work simply without having to be instructed how to use it properly. I am up with how to use all the latest technology and this still annoyed me.....
The lighting in the rooms and bathrooms are terrible so take a mirror that you use outside if you are going to try and put makeup on!
And be prepared to be attacked by mosquitos they were everywhere, so take some repellent and some spray to spray around the rooms. If you are going there with a baby I would suggest taking a mosquito net to put over the portacot.
Another thing is we travelled with our son who is 18 months old and I requested a proper wooden cot as he is a big boy so when we got to the room there was no cot at all so when the housekeeping staff brought it to the room it was only a portacot which our son wont sleep in.
Each villa has a pool so I wouldn’t suggest going there if you have small children it was too much of a worry.
When I booked it said we get a full buffet breakfast included so I was under the impression that the villas had a restaurant that we went to each morning however you select what you want off a set menu and they deliver it to the room so the first breakfast we had there was horrible and cold so we ended up going down the street to eat, the second day we didn’t bother to get breakfast through the hotel so went out again however on our last day we got breakfast as we had to leave for the airport at 9.30am and when breakfast came it was great so im unsure what happened there.
The villas are very modern and funky however in the day you can see they are a bit run down. I thought it lacked that Bali experience that makes it part of the fun going to Bali and you didn’t see anyone around the villas so the interaction with people isn’t there either.
Upon checkout I booked the hotel Van for 9.30am and at 9.50am the van still wasn’t there, when I proceeded to reception to pay the bill and check out the lady there just ignored me for at least 5 minutes – didn’t even make eye contact or say I will be with you in a moment, nothing! So I stood there and stood there while she was on the computer and looking at a sheet of paper then she was on the phone so finally I had enough and told her I was going to be late, was she doing the bill and where is our airport transfer so I did find her to be a bit rude. Another customer also came to the desk after me and he stood there then after I complained to her he walked out.
Then on our way to the airport our driver ended up smashing into the back of a truck and we had to pull over, we were all ok thank goodness however again we had a 18 month old baby in the car and he didn’t even ask if we were ok or if the baby was ok all he said was sorry. We were going to abandon the van and flag down 2 taxis however after a little while the driver continued on to the airport however the air conditioning wasn’t working.
I definitely wouldn’t stay here again I think there’s so many better places to stay in Bali.
title: Lacking the Bali Feel and Too Hightek

text:
can not say a bad word about this villa.
we booked why we where there and they gave us a good price and we would stay there again.
title: what a place

text: This villa is digital villa, just press the number button, code, remote, to open the door until flushing toilet, to turn off on the light until open close the gorden. Modern style.  There was massage bedroom u just lay down on the bed n the bed do massages n relaxing ur body. All is perfect, but just beware of some villa (we stay 3bedroom) have narrow ceramic terrace from the living room door to the swimming pool, (just 1meter)  so if u go home tipsy from clubs in seminyak u can fall down to the pool if u dont step carefully...
title: Other Atmosphere Villa

text:
We came in after a 17 hours flight from Europe. The property is located in the overly busy Semaniyak, next to hotel The Oberoi. Your first impression of the villas certainly is disappointing. The reception was kind and hospitable, however the "lobby" is a bleak place without any character, withered flowers behind the reception, bordering what is meant to be a property swimming pool bordered by “white” walls , which looks all but attractive, no atmosphere, cold. Basically you want to leave the reception area as soon as possible. Once you open the door to your (2 bedroom) villa you will get a spacious living room, a clean and large swimming pool, two bedrooms, one with TV and surround sound DVD. If you like some tasteful interior design, you will be disappointed. The owner certainly has done his best but will not qualify as an interior design wonder. More importantly we found stained pillows on the bench, two wilted plants on the table and the bed corner was stained as were the sheets. Luckily when we called the staff was helpful to restore all this and soon we got clean sheets, stains were cleaned, plants replaced for fresh good looking ones and some rather sticky places in the villa were cleaned. The owner of the villas must have had a predilection for electronics, everything from curtains to lights to even the toilets are electronic. The TV room is well equipped with flat screens (even in the toilet..) and up to date audio equipment. 

Let us not be negative here as there are plenty of good things. The staff is friendly and accommodating. The rooms are spacious and when all doors are open and the sun shines it certainly is a very nice villa. The best way is to describe it as an alternative for a hotel suite. Pity that you have no view, as the compound is rather small and your villa surrounded by walls. If you are a spoiled guest and have had the pleasure of renting fabulous villas in Thailand, Bali, Malaysia, than this is OK but certainly not spectacular.
title: Very Good but Some Mixed Feelings

text: Die Villen sind schon etwas in die Jahre gekommen aber gutes Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis. Von den 20 Villen sind sieben aktuell in Betrieb und der Staff gibt sich viel Mühe nach der langen Zeit der Pandemie den Laden wieder ins laufen zu bringen. Die Lage ist sehr zentral und die Villen sind sehr großzügig
title: Gute Preisleistung

text: Villan har tre st stora sovrum med var sitt badrum. Två har bubbelbad o det tredje ångdusch. Stort vardagsrum/kök alla rum med högt till tak. Vi var 7st vuxna o tyckte vi hade gott om plats. Poolen alldeles intill huset. Bose högtalare i alla rum o automatiska mörkläggningsgardiner, god riklig frukost o trevlig personal. Vi tyckte boendet var helt fantastiskt. Ca 400m bort finns strand för surfare men pga vågor inget för bad/snorkling. Själva området har problem med ständiga trafikköer, avsaknad av trottoarer men en hel del bra restauranger.
title: Modern villa med stora utrymmen

owner_response.text:
Kära herr Josefin A
Tack för att du bodde på C151 Smart Villas. Vi uppskattar din tid och ansträngningar för att ge oss värdefull granskning. Vi är mycket glada att läsa att du tycker om vår service, städningen och villautrustningen under din vistelse.
Vi försäkrar att leverera samma hög standard service för din nästa vistelse.


Varma hälsningar

Förvaltningen av C151

text: تقع فيلا C151 Smart Villas في موقع ممتاز قريبة من البحر والمطاعم والانشطة وكذلك الاسواق . مساحة الفيلا كبيرة , والمسبح رائع وكبير , الفيلا نظيفة ولا يوجد بها حشرات , توفر نظام الصوت في جميع مرافق الفيلا . تعاون طاقم العمل . سرعة اجراءات الدخول والخروج , الفطور حسب المنيو يتم تحضيره في الفيلا حسب الوقت الذي يحدده الضيف . مناسبة للعائلات الكبيرة , وجود التكييف في كل مرافق الفيلا بعكس غالبية فيلل بالي حيث لايتوفر التكييف الا في غرفة النوم ,  وجود جاكوزي , ادوات المطبخ متوفرة , توفر المياه الباردة والثلج . الانترنت ممتاز . شكرا C151 Smart Villas سوف اعود دائماً اليكم .
title: فيلا ذكية رائعة

text:
Bijna 2 weken in de villa gezeten! Dichtbij de gezellige markt en restaurantjes! Ook de winkelstraat is op loopafstand. Zeker een aanrader, mooie villa, groot zwembad en uiterst vriendelijk personeel! 

Jammer dat er geen restaurant of roomservice is voor als je lekker lui een dagje bij het zwembad wilt zonder het resort te verlaten.
title: Heerlijk

text: とにかく全てが広く快適でした。メゾネットの建物になっていて窓からは1階からでも2階からでも海が見えます。食事はホテルにレストランがなかったので、ホテルに行く途中のイタリアンレストランでテイクアウトしてキッチンで温めて食べました。隣にアナンタラウルワツがあるので、そちらのレストランで食べるのもありかな、と思いました。バリのホテルは色々な所に宿泊したことがありますが、サイコ―に素敵なホテルでした。
title: 素晴らしい！

text: 住过很多度假酒店，这里可以说是最感受不同的！酒店的别墅所有设备都是最先进的，充分考虑了客人的感受：超大的游泳池，足有十几米常，水深非常合适，不象有些Villa的泳池只能泡泡澡；窗帘全部是遥控的，卫生间都配备了两台电视，我们住的是两卧室的Villa，足足有7台电视！所有灯光全部是遥控的，完全现代科技！起居室超大，厨房设备非常齐全，入住期间做了两次饭，象在家一样方便！浴缸超大，可以制作各种水浪。每个卧室都很大，每个卫生间都超大。这个别墅住进来4个人显得都很空旷，不象一些Villa房间大小显得局促，完全是奢华的感受！第一次来巴厘岛就选择了这么一家酒店简直可以用超出想像的好！以后再去其他地方度假不知还能不能满意了。再来巴厘岛一定还会回到这里！
title: 超乎想像的好！非常满意！
